subject: Sales
title: Value Selling Framework
description: A quick, practical guide to Value Selling Framework.

hook.text: A seller cuts the price to close. Margins vanish. The Value Selling Framework prevents this entirely.

buildup.text: Value selling quantifies the financial impact of your solution in the buyer's own specific context.

discovery.text: When buyers see a clear dollar return, price objections dissolve. The ROI math sells the solution.

twist.text: Value selling fails when the numbers feel inflated. Buyers are deeply skeptical of vendor calculators.

climax.text: Use the buyer's own data to build the value case. Their numbers are always more credible than yours.

punchline.text: Let the buyer's own numbers prove the value.

quiz.question: Why should you use the buyer's data in value selling?
options: Buyer's own numbers are more credible than vendor estimates
